scripts.docker:run: docker rm -f beatsync-server 2>/dev/null || true && docker run --name beatsync-server -p 8080:8080 --env-file apps/server/.env beatsync
scripts.docker:prod: bun run docker:build && bun run docker:run
scripts.docker:clean: docker rm -f beatsync-server 2>/dev/null || true && docker system prune -f
